page.title: 06Community Art Project
page.content: CAPS helps to organise activities all over the Borough of Sunderland but mainly in three areas - Hendon,Southwick and Pennywell.CAPS employs 4 workers and is run by an elected committee made up from people living or working in the town.The committees meets on each third Wednesday of the month and in the evening in different parts of the town.Each month the meeting is open to the public.CAPS has helped to set up and organisations such as:-Sunderland Musicians Collective;Sunderland Writers Group and Ace Photography Co-op.A painting competition has been set up for local children.The best paintings of 'What I like to do in my holidays' will make up a mural on the wall of a play area in Valley Road.The work will be done by children in July 1985.
